entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
